verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Walk in the light,
walk in the light,
walk in the light,
walk in the light
of the Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The spirit lives to set
us free,
walk, walk in the light.
He binds us all in unity,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus promised
life to all,
walk, walk, in the light.
The dead were
wakened by his call,
walk, walk, in the light.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He died in pain
on Calvary,
walk, walk in the light.
To save the lost
like you and me,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We know his death
was not the end,
walk, walk in the light.
He gave his Spirit
to be our friend,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
By Jesus' love
our wounds are healed,
walk, walk, in the light.
The father's kindness
is revealed,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The Spirit lives
in you and me,
walk, walk in the light.
His light will shine
for all to see,
walk, walk in the light.
